TopicTitle: See the kerbal's job while in flight

Articles.Content:
This feels a bit dumb, but I'm not sure it can be done without mods. I have a bunch of manned rovers docked with a manned ship. I want to transfer engineers from the crew compartment to the rover's command modules. But I don't have only engineers inside the crew compartment. Is there a way I can be sure I'm sending engineers over to the rovers?

Because otherwise, should I break a wheel, I'd be stuck if the rover happens to carry scientists or pilots only
Switch to the vessel in question... go to map mode... on the right-hand side of the screen, click on the little Crew icon. It will list the crewmembers and their status.
